name: RUN
description:
This is an interesting parkour game with a clear style of painting, but it is extremely difficult in a simple game. If your reaction speed is too fast, you can run freely.

Game features

The goal of players in the game is to use their own operations to complete the operation as quickly as possible, and constantly jump to get higher scores.

Simple game operation, players only need to use their own mouse to control.

Game advantages

The overall playing method of the game is very novel, leaving you little reaction time. You need to be ready at all times.

There are rich map scene changes, and you will encounter different combination traps on your way forward.

Control your character to collect more gold coins, so you will get higher scores!
